nodes.text: A government of the Togruta species was active on Shili by the time of the High Republic Era. The monarchial government was led by Queen Elarec Yovet, who held the titles of Regasa of Shili, Supreme Huntress of the United Tribes, and Ruler of Togrutas. The government was composed of the Togruta military, a royal court, and the Togruta guard. Military matters were additionally supplemented by the security council and the intelligence services.
